00033 
00034 
00042     class _OgreExport MovableObject
00043     {
00044     public:
00046         MovableObject();
00047 
00050         virtual ~MovableObject() {}
00051 
00053         virtual String getName(void) = 0;
00054 
00056         virtual String getMovableType(void) = 0;
00057 
00064         virtual SceneNode* getParentNode(void);
00065 
00068         virtual void _notifyAttached(SceneNode* parent);
00069 
00071         virtual bool isAttached(void) const;
00072 
00078         virtual void _notifyCurrentCamera(Camera* cam) = 0;
00079 
00085         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox(void) const = 0;
00086 
00092         virtual void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue) = 0;
00093
